intro:
You are a low-level crew member on space station far from Earth.
You have been summoned to the bridge by the captain on a matter of grave importance.
Captain Richter: Ah, finally, I was getting thirsty. Please cadet, get me a cup of c-
The Captain catches him self by the chest and falls to the ground.
Captain Richter: C-cadet, you have to save us, get us to Earth.
He dies.
won:
You watch in awe as motors roar to full thrust and applies gentle pressure on your body.
After few days you finally reach low Earth orbit.
 You did it, you got everyone home.

NPCs.name: the captain
NPCs.description: Captain Richter lays dead upon the floor. He has a note sewn to his uniform. Should use it.

NPCs.name: Jim Spacer
NPCs.description: Jim nonchalantly leans on the wall, doing with the up most effectiveness not his job.

dialogue.intro:
You go towards the janitor.
Jim Spacer: What'ya looki'n at?

options.text: What are you up to my good sir?

nextDialogue.intro:
He gives you a mean look.
Jim Spacer: What does it look like i'm doin'? I'm enjoying my break.

options.text: The captain appears to have left this corporeal realm.

nextDialogue.intro:
Jim gives you a puzzled look.
Jim Spacer: You mean he's dead?
Jim Spacer: Old captain finally kicked the bucked, had it coming with the paint huffin'. And you tellin' me why?

options.text: I need a password to captains computer, though you might know the password

nextDialogue.intro: Jim Spacer: And you'd be right, but I ain't givin' it for jack squat. Bring me coffee from cafeteria and I'll share.
Jim Spacer: Ahhh… that’s horrible, take that stuff away from me. But since you are here. Password’s "RICH123".

locations.name: North Hall
locations.description: Nicely lit room with logos of The United Earth federation imprinted on the walls.

locations.name: Canteen
locations.description:
Large room with many tables and a central pillar for dispensing food.
Coffee maker seems to be broken, there is an unattended coffee next to it. A crowbar seems to be inside a glass case.

stored.name: coffee
stored.description: Barely hot, barely drinkable, but hushes the voices.

locations.name: Lounge
locations.description: Ping pong tables, chess tables and even normal tables can be found here for the pleasure of the crew. Jim Spacer the cleaner is here.

locations.name: South Hall
locations.description: One flickering light is illuminating the hall. The walls are gradually darker towards the boiler. Spacer has left a roll of duct tape here.

stored.name: duct tape
stored.description: It can seal a boat that is in half.

locations.name: Boiler
locations.description: Dust is everywhere. Here is the boiler, fueled by coal, that powers the entire ship.

locations.name: Airlock Exterior
locations.description: A narrow platform clinging to the hull of the ship. The orion constellation can be seen magnificently from here.

locations.name: Cargo Area
locations.description: Crates are bolted directly to the hull, for those who couldn't effort keeping in inside.

locations.name: Boiler Section
locations.description: Vents and pipes are radiating heat into the void of space.

locations.name: Bridge Exterior
locations.description: The exterior of the bridge. You can faintly see consoles through the viewport.

airlock.name: Airlock
airlock.description: Small chamber with space suits, a button to evacuate the air and a lever to open the airlock.

stored.name: space suit
stored.description: Developed by the finest engineers above the age of 9.

airlock.lever_NoSuitDeath:
You pull down the lever without a second thought. A large "sss" echos trough the room
as the escaping air rolls out from the room, as well from your lungs. You start to suffocate.
airlock.lever_CompressionWhileDoorOpenedDeath:
You pull up the lever. Air floods the room and immediately escapes trough the open door
dragging you also trough the door. You are flung into spacer, your vision is blurry
from the rotating acceleration. You slowly run out of oxygen.
airlock.lever_Decompress:
You pull down the lever. A large "sss" echos trough the room as the air starts to disappear from the room.
There is no more air in the room.
airlock.lever_Compress:
You pull up the lever. A large "sss" echos trough the room as the air starts to fill in the room.
There is air again in the room.
airlock.door_Close: You push the button. The outside door closes.
airlock.door_CompressedFlungWithoutSuitDeath:
You push the button without a second thought. The outside door opens.
The pressure change flings the air like a roaring thunder alongside you trough the door.
You feel slightly colder as the air escapes from your lungs and you suffocate.
airlock.door_CompressedFlungWithSuitDeath:
You push the button. The outside door opens.
The pressure change flings the air like a roaring thunder alongside you trough the door.
Your vision is blurry from the rotating acceleration. You slowly run out of oxygen.
airlock.door_Open: You push the button. The outside door opens.

boiler.name: Boiler
boiler.description: Dust is everywhere. Here is the boiler, fueled by coal, that powers the entire ship.
boiler.questDone: You spill the contents of the bag inside the boiler. With majestic golden colors machines around it are put into motion.

bridge.name: Bridge
bridge.description: A clean room full of computers and one large window. Also the captain is still dead.
bridge.noteMs:
You look at the note at his uniform. It seems to be the coordinates...
NOW YOU KNOW COORDINATES TO EARTH
bridge.meteoroidsMs:
PREPARING FOR THRUST...
...
...
METEOROID SWARM IMMINENT, CANCELING THRUST

The entire ship violently shakes as tiny pellets hit the hull. The display flashes again

HULL REPAIR NEEDED

storage.name: Storage
storage.description: Mountains upon mountains of creates lay here. All sorts off things are stored here.
storage.gotCoal:
You pull out your trust crowbar and open up the create. The crowbar breaks in half,
but not before you get in. There is a small back of coal. You take it

damaged.name: Recreation Area Exterior
damaged.description:
The meteoroid hit here. most of the hull on this side is blackened from dust.
There is a small indentation where the radiation shield has been stripped.
Nothing major, from that fact that Jim is currently developing cancer. Better seal it.
damaged.sealed: You carefully pullout a roll of duct tape and masterfully repair all the damages.
damaged.newDescription:
Most of the hull on this side is blackened from dust.
There is a small indentation where the radiation shield has been stripped. Few pieces of duct tape is where a tear used to be.
